ratata wadadayi yahapath piripun pudgalayan bihi kirime mulika thothanna wana purwa lamawiya sanwardhana madhyasthana wishala sankhyawak rata pura pawathiyada, in bahutharayak nisi pramithiyakin ha kramawedayakin thorawa pawathwa gena yama hethuwen, daruwange paurusha wardhanayeth, saradharma ha mulika adhyapana pelagasmeth, runathmaka bawak daknata labena heyin, pera pasal adhyapana madhyasthanawala bhauthika pahasukam pawathwa ganima, sudusukam sahitha palikawan path kirima, iganwime kriyawaliye gunathmakabhawaya surakima sandaha owun puhunu patamala sandaha yomu kirima menma, madhyasthana palikawan sandaha nishchitha watup/dimana labadima mangin owunge anagatha surakshithabhawaya athi kirima thulin pera pasal adhyapanaya nanga situwima sandaha kramawath wada piliwelak sakas kala yuthuyayi mema parlimenthuwa yojana karayi.
